Virgil van Dijk is 'a little bit injured' with a hamstring issue, Jürgen Klopp has confirmed. (@LFC)

Klopp on Van Dijk: “He is a little bit injured – not really serious but too much. It was immediately after the game against Everton he felt a little bit. We made an assessment."

Klopp on Van Dijk: “If it’s the last game of the season maybe you take the risk but it’s not the last game of the season obviously. That’s why we can’t take the risk.”
